content: Automatic opens and no way to turn that "feature" off. When on the internet, if I click on any link that goes to Amazon, it DOES NOT open in my browser, it opens in the app. I can see where this might be useful but not as a forced "feature". I should be able to decide if it is the default for any and all Amazon links. The issue is with allowing another person to google something on my phone, they click on a Amazon link and POP they are in MY Amazon account. That isn't ok.

I used Amazon. App pretty much everyday.. looking up things , future wants and purchases. As of a couple months back I lost the ability to filter my search. Two days ago the app said it is no longer compatible. Play store won't let me update it. It downloads, starts install and fizzles out. Clear cache, uninstall completely, and still fizzles out.

My security app is showing that the app has a Trojan Script. When I had the Amazon app, it was super slow and wouldn't load. Along with glitches on my phone which I believe its the trojan associated to it. I submitted this to the Amazon Bug Program but you guys deemed it "false positive result from a scanner as opposed to a real finding". I believe your app needs an update and security check.

I love shopping on Amazon and do so at least weekly. However, the app has really gone down hill. The search engine and filter options have never been as good as eBay, but lately the set up is just awful. When I am searching for something and scrolling I do not like having to constantly swipe left and right. This is not tender. I want to scroll freely. When I reach the bottom of the page it is now not letting me swipe from previous to next, I can only view the first page of results. Please fix!!!

Garbage. Poorly designed UI. Slower than molasses at absolute zero. Actions load faster when I use Amazon through the web browser on my phone. It's perfectly usable but things load so slowly that it's more productive to do literally anything else. Although the app may work differently on other phones, on my Samsung S7 it runs terrible. Mobile apps are meant to be convenient, this is anything but.

The lag is so bad it renders this app unusable. It doesn't matter how good it looks (it does), how good the interface is (very), or how intuitive it is to use (yup, top marks) if it takes 30 seconds to complete a simple task or lags horribly when trying to scroll. A missed opportunity.

Terrible market place, half the reviews are fake, half the listings send different products to different people. The app interface isn't great for browsing. The options provided for search filters are pretty random, most of the time I can't filter by price. Amazon flat out lies about delivery date and availability of free delivery on the item listing. Even though the dates on the listings claim to be specific to my postcode, when I go to pay, the options are always different. Waste of time.

Love the app very much and have been using it for almost 5 years. I'm giving it 4 stars because I have a minor issue with the apps ui. When browsing for used products, for much more affordable deals... some will pop up and some don't. No matter how many times I tap my screen, on both of my Android devices, nothing happens. But when I press my thumb and hold for a few seconds, all it does it highlight the typical blue text, a different color. Please fix this asap! Thank you!

Overall, easy to use. Filters leave a lot to be desired. At times, you see various options available within your criteria, but one you apply a filter, they seem to vanish. Needs work. Filtering by price rage, a basic option on a computer, is not available and is needed to reduce the clutter. You should also add an option to filter shipping cost, so one can eliminate the penny priced items with inflated shipping cost, misleading and wrong, which is why I dropped you to 2 stars.

I've always been a big fan of Amazon as a service but I'm shocked at how poor the shopping app has become. I contacted Amazon to advise that the links to browse preowned listings are not working for any items via the app. The solution they suggested was to use a browser instead. If If I use a browser, what is the point of having the app at all. If there's a problem, fix it! Even better, test updates before rolling then out üò°

Broken. It doesn't search or load right anymore. Just gives a blank white page and the search bars. Doesn't open when you click amazon links or any tabs in the app. Everything just leads to a white page. Edit: After seeing someone else's review I can confirm the app breaks when using a VPN. Loaded pages and links when vpn was disabled and broke again when it was turned back on. Still broken, every other app works with my vpn so why does this have have a total failure with it.

Well wow they got rid of the add to cart button completely. Now they offer bundles. You find the item you want, decide to buy it and you have to go into the bundled offers, unclick the items you DON'T want THEN add the item you originally wanted to cart. Lately I've been buying more from local vendors especially with amazon's inferior products. I think this is the time to finally take the plunge. I don't like how they're trying to force my hands. Don't try and upsell me during a pandemic.

Why would you break something that used to work fine?? Ever since the search results moved to 2 columns this app is useless. I can't move the screen to even see the second column or tap the "next" button to see the results past the first page! I can't even SEE a "next" button and the screen doesn't scroll left/right at all! Ever since system updates obliterated my phone's auto-rotate feature to the point where it's not an option in my settings, I can't even use that as a temporary fix. WHY???

Good for ordering on the go. Prime membership is a no-brainer....SO many perks!!! Shipping practices have gotten a little sloppy - using plastic bags for cases of pet food, Large bubble envelopes for a small jewelry-type box, leaving gaps in tape when covering boxes so anything could fall out... You get the picture. Could be because of CO-V though as it has been last few months only. Before was fine. Amazon is excellent with returns as long as you follow the guidelines.

New update is bad for digital music customers. They've removed the preview feature and the ability to purchase individual songs. If the plan is to move all of that over to the Amazon Music service, add that feature BEFORE removing it from Amazon Shopping. It looks like they are setting up a structure for that but right now the ability to preview and individual song purchase doesn't exist and it's been gone for about a week.

Having issues with the filters at the top of the screen. They cut/run off the edge and don't display all. Not all drop down to choose how to filter. Once search items come up, there are 2 vertical columns, but I can't view the 2nd/right side column unless I turn phone sideways/horizontal. When phone is vertical, the NEXT button is not displayed and won't swipe over, so again, have to turn phone sideways/horizontal to view and hit next. The recent updates made things worse/not user friendly.

Someone needs to completely redesign App. It's hard to find anything. Sometimes you can't click on parts because the screen doesn't autofill. I have to move items into focus because they're on the other side and,(expletives) I have to scour for the right price and as soon as I make a purchase it recommends the same thing or something better for cheaper(would have been nice if it popped up in the search!). I don't usually complain. Please fix it guys. Amazon Customer service reps is 5 star though

Terrible update! Fir weeks when searching for an item after I've gotten to the bottom of the page, I am unable to click the next button. The page will not slide sideways for me to even have the option to go to the next page. I used to love how easily Amazon could be navigated, but now its seems I'm just frustrated and annoyed. Definitely canceling my membership, no point in paying for a glitched service.

I don't like the fact that the company can switch prices after your order is filled. I've been overcharged, so I canceled my orders. Money is being taken daily, then as I decide to take a look at my orders. The prices went up on a few items. I wanted what I was paying for, not anything else. I won't be shopping with amazon again. My previous orders were the done the same way. That's not cool. Please inform your customers when the prices suddenly switch and go up on there orders.

New app sucks! Apparently finding what you want was too convenient in the older app. Type what you want, filter out by rating , price, prime all nicely at the top of the page.... NOPE TOO EASY. Now you got to open the menu, search through a long list of "departments" find the one that magically fits your product, go to another page, narrow down what your looking for, THEN you may search and filter things. What fresh out of college kid thought that was a good idea?!?

Still waiting on like 3 of my packages, from months ago. They have a "A-Z Guarantee" apparently they say. But I've tried emailing the actual seller of the product and Amazon. They've shown little ability to help, and even less ability to care. I've spent hundreds of dollars on things for them not to arrive and then customer service can't help. I'll be deactivating my account and literally shopping anywhere else. LOCAL!!

Hey Amazon, there's a problem with the delivery chooser. When I try to change the delivery method in the checkout screen, I can see the options, with the radio buttons next to them, but I can't click on the various different options. The delivery option text slightly overlaps the radio buttons, so I expect there's a screen layout problem. Please fix this as I've had to abandon the app and use the web browser version until this is fixed!

Amazon Prime is designed to keep raising prices before your final purchase. In less than a week I observed 9 price changes on the same item from the same company. When the price automatically raised I deleted the item from my cart. When I searched for the item again the price had lowered a little until I tried to purchase it, then it suddenly jumped up another $5. I firmly believe amazon Prime is designed to continuously scam people are higher prices.

No longer working properly on my phone. Doesn't show the full screen when scrolling through products, also cannot move page to see the right hand side, so filter options are very limited as well as the next button for the next page, have to turn my phone to landscape to get just enough of it to click. Come on amazon put the faults right so we can actually use the app!

I've had this app for years, but finally fed up with one issue to leave a review. The app resets my progress when looking at a list like daily deals. It happens when I select an item and go to that page and then decide to return to the list and press the back button. When I go back to continue viewing the list it starts me at the top. So infuriating that I stop shopping which is a lose/lose for both parties. Please fix.

Although I've usually had good experiences with prime this one was way different. I had to cancel my order because I don't have the money. (I did in the bank but not for free spending) I tried cancelling the order 4 times. 3 cancel orders requests were sent. So I spent the money I had (the reason I canceled the order) stupidly assuming it would go through. The order cancellation did not go through. Lesson learned. I love prime but please make sure u absolutely want your order before purchasing.

The app is bloated, slow, and non functional most of the time. Managing your Wishlists is a nightmare, as most of the time the app just doesnt respond when you try to add stuff to them, move stuff around, or just plain old crashes. It takes up to 20 presses just to get one thing MAYBE added to a list, if it doesnt crash first, or click on something else. Its not my phone - its the app. My phone works perfectly fine for all other apps, its fast, and has no lag. Its just this app that breaks.

I would give 5-stars but I believe that the filter refining tool needs to be improved. It seems that when I choose to have items sorted by price that a lot of the items disappear. For example, I usually select prime first which eliminates all but prime delivery options. But I prefer to sort the remaining items by price from low to high or vice versa. This usually eliminates a lot more items and I am not sure why. Also, if I am looking for a specific item, I want only that item not associated ite

I pay extra for prime and cant even get my stuff on time. I am paying extra, and some items arent even shipped by the date they are supposed to arrive on. I contacted customer service and they said the best they can do is cancel the order and then i can pay for expedited shipping. So they want me to pay extra for an item i would still receive late. This is how they treat customers that are paying an extra monthly fee to supposedly recieve items faster.

App is super convenient and great for finding and comparing items. Only thing is that it often has bugs where you get stuck trying to do certain things. Most commonly when you try to switch from standard shipping to free shipping (which once eligible should be the automatic selection) the app will get stuck on a loading page forever. Only way to solve it is to back out of the app, go back in without closing it, then click continue again

I have ordered from Amazon a few times, not alot though, infact probably less then 10 times, but each of these times I have gotten my things on time, with out any problems. So based off of my experience with Amazon so far, I would highly recommend them, and I definitely give them a thumbs up. I have also noticed their prices to be a little cheaper, which is always in good thing, don't you agree?

I can't see all the filters... This has been going on on and off for a while. I have to go on my tablet which is inconvenient at times cause the app doesn't let me see filters ..or it's HUGE and I can't slide the page over to view. So annoying. And I updated to see if it would fix it .. NOPE. COOOOOOOOOOOOL I love paying for prime when first off, majority of the time I don't actually get 2 day shipping AND the app is always changing the layout. 2 years ago it was mint. Now. Hunk of junk ..

I'm constantly using the app for purchases and im an Amazon prime member. Recently I'm severely frustrated with the app. You cannot switch your searched items view. There is no way to choose grid view or list view. There is no way to zoom out to view. Also unless you turn your phone to landscape you miss an entire column of items available for purchase. You can no longer swipe left at the bottom inorder to click next. You also can no longer swipe left at the top to choose your different filters

App is not working properly. It loads pages very slow or not at all. Constantly goes to the error page with "Go to Amazon Home" button. Amazon needs to fix the issues with this APP as soon as possible. Many people need this app to work because they need essential supplies Amazon has in stock. Update: July 2020, This App still sucks, it consistently fails to load pages. There are many complaints of this version of the Amazon App, however Amazon still has not fixed it...WHY NOT???

horrible it opens but is blank. wont open anything. i only switched to this one because the other amazon app said support for it would be ending soon and to switch to this. not helpful when it doesn't work. Update: it worked for a while not I can only view the first page it won't let me move the screen to click next page. Can only view part of the page at that. It doesn't let me swipe over at all.

Terrible app for shopping. There aren't enough filters when you search so you're left sifting through way too much stuff. If i want a product between $100-$300 there should be a filter to make that easier, instead i have to sort by highest or lowest price and then go through page by page until i get to the price point i want...ridiculous! The website will show me a product that's eligible for monthly payments, but the app will show that same product but no option for payments!

My app has stopped showing full result for searched items, instead giving me one page with maybe ten or twelve items and that's it. Tried to use customer service chat to report this issue and was passed off to six different people - mid-conversation - none of which seemed to understand that my issue was with the SEARCH RESULTS, not an individual item. I do not believe they will address this issue, so maybe this will help get it fixed. Also seriously bad customer service.

I can and have been ordering products from Amazon for years. It is a convenient way to shop. I never have to leave the comfort of my home to head into a crowded store. Everything ships directly to my front door. I joined prime membership. Shipping is usually free on most items. Prices are very competitive. Also they offer a wide range of products to select from. In my opinion, it is much better than Wal- Mart.

Filter button has to be pressed 10 times to open!!!!! Every filter you selec closes the filler menu, so you have to press the dang button another 10 times to open it!!!!!!!!!!! Tweaking your search clears all your filters so you have to start again from scratch on your filters if you fix a spelling mistake!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! But seriously, finding a needle in a haystack is both easier and less painful than this.

Used to be so good.... now it looks like a website that isn't designed for mobile devices. It's hard to browse through items when you can't see half of the screen. Edit: I gave it a lower score before because the app had recently become so uncomfortable to use for browsing items after app updates. But it was probably my fault. I had delayed phone updates for awhile. I finally did it recently and it seems like the amazon app became more usable again. Whoops.

I dont know what happened but the past couple of updates the app has begun acting weird on my phone (galaxy note 10+) I have to Uninstall and re install and every time it has a different problem. For example the search comes in zoomed way in and wont side scroll. Re install the app and my prime switch and filter option are missing. Amazon needs to get their act together.

I like amazon and the app is ok but I needed to cancel my membership and it was confusing for me. They give 2options set reminder or cancel membership. I payed for month so I didn't want to cancel just yet so i set reminder did this multiple times it never reminded and i forgot. So I finally just said screw I'm canceling in the middle of the month I'm tired of wasting money. To find out I could schedule to cancel the day of renewal.why is that not an main option on the management page.

Since the last update it crashes constantly. The option to buy from other sellers is all but completely unselectable, and even if you are able to find the sweet spot where the link responds to touch the app just freezes. It works functionally for most things so I give it 2 stars, but the constant crashing made it hard to give that even.

I have loved Amazon for years but the Latest update for Android phone has made the search function absolutely useless. You get one screen of results but no next button. Filter options at top of screen don't scroll and drop downs for the ones that do show are worthless. My tablet is still 2 versions back and I'm NOT updating it. Amazon isn't usable without a search function.

Thank you!! Everything has been put back in order and I'm back to happy shopping!! I want the original deal of the day and lightening deals back when i open my app. I don't have alexa, kindle, or their tv etc. I'm pretty pssed i can't get what i had, easy shopping! Put it back or at least let ppl choose start their home page is, i pay for prime, but seems what i use it for has been taken away at my expense.

I'm giving 3 stars - on one hand, it's convenient on a phone/tablet you usually carry with you, checking on orders not too bad... on the other hand it's so frustratingly slow I usually just use the pc. App is very slow. Example... search for item, too many unrelated items/no reviews/sketchy junk. Need more than 1 filter is ridiculous, only one at a time before it needs to reload everything, waiting again.

Did give 5 star however I'm having problems since update. Everything is zoomed in a lot. Then when I try to view an item it just flickers on and off. Completely unusable when clicking on an item. Can't order anything since subscribed to prime. What...I pay to receive a worse experience?? If this is not fixed I will unsubscribe and uninstall.

I have been a loyal Amazon Prime member for years. I rely on Amazon because I have lived in multiple places where retail options are scarce. Today I was severely disappointed in this company. They lost my package with 3 items that I need for teaching. They didn't offer the refund/ replacement option for all of my items until I called someone. Why would it not be an automated option to refund/ return EVERY item that your company is responsible for losng? But then upon speaking with two different individuals, they said the only option available to me, if I still wanted my teaching supplies, was a refund and to then use that refund to reorder my items. On items that were "Prime" items, to wait four days for them to actually deem them lost, to then waste a day of speaking with people who ultimately couldn't help me, to then be offered the charity to be able to reorder my own items... I am done. I will go to the trouble that it takes to order from other individual companies from now on to NEVER have to go through that again. This wealthy company will not take a hit when it means doing what is right by its customers when it makes a mistake. That is poor customer service. This is a fine company until something goes wrong, then they show their true colors. Very disappointing.

Incredibly slow. Search for a product, click a product to be taken to product page, proceed to click product image 20 times before it finally shows you the gallery. Same story for adding to basket, clicking reviews (or pretty much anything on the product page) or viewing an item in your basket. I understand that they're probably dealing with insane amounts of traffic, but surely they can do better than this?!

App was slow to load... I click where I expect something to popin when it finally loads, and instead it starts my amazon prime trial. I don't have time to be using that right now, so now it's wasted. Anything that's for a pay service should have confirmation... and the app being slow is because you were loading the ad in the first place. Bad design.

I've been ordering off of Amazon for a few years now and I've got to say that it is an amazing experience. I honestly can't wait for the text message with the little photo of my package delivered, its honestly like a mini Christmas feeling, hahaha. I've had a few problems here and there and customer service was great; albeit it took some time, but none the less all problems solved.

Unable to click next to view the other pages for my search. Also, there are problems with how the searched items are shown, most of the time you have to swipe down, left to right, then down to swipe left to right again. The app is not useful for Amazon shopping.

The app has gone downhill recently and I don't know why. Whenever I try to search for something I can only see part of the screen and cannot get to the next button without changing my phone to landscape. I also cannot scroll at the top to change the various filters. I love shopping on Amazon, but there have been several times that I have given up looking for something because of how the app is set up and bought it from somewhere else.

New update is terrible and very hard to search for specific items. No way to change the settings either to where you can view items in a row, instead it spaces them all out to where I'm having to move my screen view all over as if I'm zoomed way in. This is terrible. Amazon, who are you letting change your apps? They don't care about your profit! Whoever is updating these apps needs to be fired!

I updated the app around June and since then it has been horrible. I used to be able to use the drop down filter and select all filters i wanted at once. Now you have to select one filter at a time, because every time you click something the app refreshes instantly, and you have to keep clicking your filter choices one by one, and wait for amazon to apply selection one by one. Also you can't drag the items to the bottom tray wish list anymore. All these little things = pain to shop with the app

Amazon is amazing! I should've been ordering from them a long time ago! Products are perfect and in excellent condition! Plus fast delivery service! I've ordered from many different companies since COVID-19 hit this horrible country, and Amazon has surpassed my expectations! Walmart seems to have a decent delivery time but still nothing compared to Amazon!

The functionality of the app is terrible. There's no filtration system for what you looking for specifically, all the comparisons in the world but if you can't edit what comparisons you looking for don't feel too down what you're looking for it's kind of pointless. Not being able to filter your results when you search is terrible. And user interface being optionable to what you see as a user and what you like is user I mean 90% of the other apps that they have this function why doesn't you

Love Amazon, but the app is not good anymore. I used to be able to go to my Amazon app, type what I'm looking for, put in a couple of filters, and find what I want. The filters are useless now. There are no filters for basics anymore. For clothes or shoes I need Size, Color, Material, and Price. Those filters are gone now. The filters that are there are horizontal across the screen, but they run off the edge and they don't scroll. Useless! Just let me search and buy quickly

Most of the products are missing significant data in the descriptions. The weight/volume/sizing units are interspersed, using metric, imperial and US customary measurement systems making price comparison a complete nightmare! Many times I have simply stopped looking and gone to Ebay and other online stores. With simple standards in place, it would be so much easier to buy. I win, Amazon wins, the vendors/suppliers win. The more convoluted the shopping experience becomes, the faster I walk away.

I love everything about Amazon. I am impressed with the variety of merchandise available. I love the reviews; they are so helpful to making decisions. Shipping is top notch; love the text notices keeping me informed of shipments. The 2 returns I had to make were easy peasy & credit given as soon as item was checked in for return. Amazon is Amazing.

Update on 28 July: The app is less crashing now but the viewing size; and NEXT button to see the next page is terrible. The viewing completely is out of proportion if your phone is viewed vertically. Horizontally you can see the next button but things with BACK button looking awkward. I'm really frustrated, just give us back the good old working app.

Very glitchy and unreliable. Used to get notifications in good time, I knew when things are arriving and such. Now sometimes it does give notifications but mostly none at all and when it does want to give me notifications the timing is way off or I literally had the item recieved when it is meant to but I get a notification the following day that its only just been dispatched, but I have already received the item? Very confusing sometimes

Why does these big company apps give me soo much stress! I want to now delete all 3 Amazon apps and never use again! Am Sure I will find another music app, movie app and ebay!! Twice I have had payment issues. I pay with my card, says payment accepted! Then as soon as I leave page, back to payment issues again! Frustration and annoying plus really not worth the stress..... bye Amazon! P.s all other companies seem to be taking payments just fine no problems at all!!

I just updated your app to try to correct a fault on the page but it did not work. When you select an item you want to buy the page pops up. Then you have the option of new and used with sellers and prices. You click on this to see the full list but for some reason notting happens. It's not my phone as I have tried other options on the page. If this is not corrected the app is useless. Thanks David

poorly designd. search and product result pages are not at all intuitive. does not give an option to set price range for filtering. relies on an antiquated "next page system" as opposed to numbered page results whjch would allow one to skip through results faster (since the app doesn't allow custom price range filtering). skip this app, just use the website.

I guess i NEVER need to shop for anything on Amazon ever again! Stupid Amazon app FORCED me to update - couldn't use app without updating; i HATE that! - and now the app won't work. Keeps crashing. I've restarted phone, etc... App constantly crashes every time I try to open it. I guess that's one way to save money since i buy tons of stuff on Amazon. Dear Amazon, if you are gonna have a crappy, useless update, don't FORCE people to get the update! Fix it it or lose my business.

It was in fine working order until about an hour ago I went to out an order through and noticed some strange name added to my account and my name completely gone from it. I logged out and deleted the app. Went onto Amazon from my computer and that other name is nowhere on my account. I'm guessing the Amazon app got hacked but not the internet version so be careful!!! This app needs ALOT of screening and security because whoever this was knew how to get around the extra security I have on there.

Was good but now it's scrappy. The words get jumbled up and images fail to appear. Am now uninstalling the app. Downloaded again and found now working perfectly. Previous 'scrappy' images etc have disappeared. Amended to 5 stars. That was yesterday. Failed to load today. Unistalled. Had a thought. Downloaded again. Paused my VPN and tried this app again. This time okay. Fails with VPN activated.

Honestly the last update that the app had on my LG Stylo 5 sucks. It really brought down my mood because all the products that I used to search would fit in my screen when they appeared but now I need to swipe right and left just to see two products on the same row. I can't even change the view mode now (list or grid). It is really annoying because even the pictures are too big for the screen. The developper's team needs to work on this. The filters don't even respond when I press on them.

VERY unreliable, the items I BUY are almost always delayed or sometimes just never shows up. I pay extra to have my package on a certain date and amazon proves to be incapable of it. And they wont give your money back theyll only give "5$ of promotional credit" save your time and money and try a regular shipping company, because Amazon's customer support will only laugh at you

I have prime, so I will be judging this on its prime features. I love the quick and speedy delivery (only on some products unfortunately) and the large catalog it provides. Nice layout with sub-categories if you are looking to explore and easily search for items. There's more to this app, but as a basic user, this is a very nice way to recieve delivery from many items online.

The latest version is awful! The filters are now singular and complicated, and when getting to the bottom of a search, there is no 'next' option for further pages and goods, just a 'previous' which is redundant because there is only one page available anyway. Awful app now.

This app was iffy at best before the new update, now it frustrates me so much I refuse to use it. It takes forever to add stuff to the cart, size/style options take forever to load, and the more you search for things it seems like the worse it gets. Going to stop shopping Amazon until this can be fixed. I don't have time to wait on the app to do things.

The app has been non-functional for a couple of weeks now. I am able to look at past orders, but everything else goes to the "oops" error page. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling, signing out and back in. Nothing has worked. I liked it when it worked.Please fix your bug(s)!

This is by far the worst app I've ever used that I bother to keep on my phone. The layout & design could use some revisions, but are mostly fine. The problem is how sluggish & unresponsive the app is. Most clicks take 10 sec or longer to go through (including pop ups for product options like "size" or "color"). Way too often, a click yields no response at all. Then sometimes 2 click attempts go through in rapid succession and the 2nd lands on something I didn't want to click. VERY frustrating.

This company blocks negative reviews that are positively written. I reviewed a product that they sent me that was labeled new but was visually used when I opened it. I reviewed my findings and was told they couldnt post it. Im guessing cause it was "Amazon" recommended and had a positive of 7 which was a new product. I really miss Ebay but they are iffy and slow lately. Also as someone stated below the two day shipping is mainly untrue. Also this app is force bloatware that comes preinstalled.

Battery hungry app... For such a giant, the app is poorly designed. The 'Add to Cart' needs to be hit 5-10 times to add items to cart. The battery optimization is probably the worst of the tons of app I have on my phone. It also has heavy background usage for no apparent reason. Amazon take sometime to improve existing products before launching new ones.

Like it's not bad in the sense of keeping track of wishlists and such. But goddam I can't shop or browse on the damn app. Every time I search "oops, something went with.". Every time I want to look at a wishlist. "Oops, something went wrong.". Go to the shopping cart. "Oops, something went wrong". The app itself isn't crashing, but I just can't do anything without the app going "oopsie poopsie.". Very obnoxious and makes the app totally useless

The website offers a better structure and more options.
